name: JS Testing with Jasmine Karma Coverage JSHint GRUNT
tagline: Example to demo Jasmine Karma Coverage JSHint with GRUNT
body:
The aim of this example is to demo to beginners on how to;
* unit test for JS With Jasmine.
* run jasmine test suite with using Karma.
* generate unit test coverage reports.
* run static code analysis with JSHInt.
* automate all the above steps with GRUNT.

This webpage is still under construction. Will keep you posted on updates.
You can visit GitHUb for this [example](https://github.com/msantoshpalakkad/Jasmine-Karma-Coverage-JSHint-GRUNT-Example.git).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
